Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 130th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2006...
Released by Cincinnati on 2/4/2008...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/1/2008 to a minor league contract.
Released by St. Louis on 4/15/2008...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 7/7/2008 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/21/2011 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/11/2014, off Madison Bumgarner (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/2014, off Rick Ankiel (DET)...
Traded from Minnesota to Cincinnati on 2/4/2015 (Going to CIN: C G. Menendez. Going to MIN: 2B A. Martines)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/10/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $3,200,001 per year...
Traded from Chicago (A) to New York (N) on 5/7/2021 (Going to NYN: C G. Menendez. Going to CHA: 3B S. Rickel)...
Injured on 6/25/2021 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
